publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1845 Alasdair Morgan: Convention Rights (Compliance) (Scotland) Bill—That the Justice 1 Committee considers the Convention Rights (Compliance) (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: parts 2 to 7, part 1 and the schedule.

S1M-1845 Alasdair Morgan: Convention Rights (Compliance) (Scotland) Bill—That the Justice 1 Committee considers the Convention Rights (Compliance) (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: Parts 2 to 7, Part 1 and the schedule.
